txt.en:
'We could probably slay these vile cats from dawn 'til dusk and not see the end of them. We need to strike them where it will do the most harm.

'Surely among the Khundolar at Lashkarg is one who trains these creatures. Hunt him out and defeat him. With their trainer gone, the cats may even turn upon their own.

'Will you do this?'
'You slew this Sherkóz? Did the cats turn upon the Khundolar?\n\n'Ah, I suppose it was too much to hope for. You have my thanks for your efforts, [placeholder].'
'Have you dealt with the Khundolar's cat-trainer yet?'
It is clear that the wild cats of the Brown Lands are anything but wild, and Twiga has a plan to do away with them.
The trainer of the Khundolar battle-cats may be found at Lashkarg, south-east of Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nTwiga asked you to hunt down the trainer of the Khundolar battle-cats and defeat him.
Talk to Twiga at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
Twiga is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands, north-west of Lashkarg.\n\nYou should return to Twiga with tidings of your victory.
